sqlMap.insert: insert into comm_post_files (file_no, file_name, file_post_no) values (comm_posts_files_seq.nextval, #name#, comm_posts_seq.nextval)
sqlMap.update: update comm_post_files set A.file_no as fileNo, A.file_name as name, B.post_no as "file.postNo" from comm_post_files A, comm_posts B where A.file_post_no = B.post_no
sqlMap.select: select A.file_no as fileNo, A.file_name as name, B.post_no as "file.postNo" from comm_post_files A, comm_posts B where A.file_no = #value# and A.file_post_no = B.post_no
